define: [Only for ID mart seller] The API allows sellers to retrieve their current packaging fee settings.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"TkNywcZ","children":[{"description":"

Indicates whether the seller has enabled or disabled the packaging fee configuration.

True: The seller charges a packaging fee.

False: The seller does not charge a packaging fee.

","name":"enable","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"sdmmpiE"},{"description":"

Returned only if enabled is set to True.

","name":"dimension","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"BwWimGt","children":[{"description":"

The length of the packaging in centimetres (cm).

","name":"length","sample":"15","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"bQaizAj"},{"description":"

The height of the packaging in centimetres (cm).

","name":"height","sample":"15","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"HcemRjj"}]},{"description":"

Returned only if enabled is set to True.

","name":"packaging_fee","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"HeNnibs","children":[{"description":"

","name":"value","sample":"100.00","type":"float","required":null,"key":"cAjHytz"}]}]}]}
